Package org.apache.wayang.core.util.fs

Interface FileSystem

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HadoopFileSystem, LocalFileSystem, S3FileSystem
    public interface FileSystem
    Abstraction for accessing a file system.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description

      java.io.OutputStream create​(java.lang.String url)
      Opens the file specified in the given url for (over-)writing.

      Opens the file specified in the given url for (over-)writing.

      Deletes the given file at the given url.

    • Method Detail

      • getFileSize

        long getFileSize​(java.lang.String fileUrl)
          throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Return the number of bytes of a given file.
        Parameters:
        fileUrl - URL that identifies the filed
        Returns:
        the number of bytes of the file
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if the file could not be found

      • canHandle

        boolean canHandle​(java.lang.String url)
        Returns:
        whether this instance is eligible to operate the file specified in the given url

      • open

        java.io.InputStream open​(java.lang.String url)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Opens the file specified in the given url.
        Parameters:
        url - points to the file to be opened
        Returns:
        an InputStream with the file's contents
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the file cannot be accessed properly for whatever reason

      • create

        java.io.OutputStream create​(java.lang.String url)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Opens the file specified in the given url for (over-)writing.
        Parameters:
        url - points to the file to be created
        Returns:
        an OutputStream that allows writing to the specified file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the file cannot be created properly for whatever reason

      • create

        java.io.OutputStream create​(java.lang.String url,
                            java.lang.Boolean forceCreateParentDirs)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Opens the file specified in the given url for (over-)writing.
        Parameters:
        url - points to the file to be created
        forceCreateParentDirs - if true, will create parent directories if they don't exist.
        Returns:
        an OutputStream that allows writing to the specified file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the file cannot be created properly for whatever reason

      • isDirectory

        boolean isDirectory​(java.lang.String url)

      • listChildren

        java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> listChildren​(java.lang.String url)

      • delete

        boolean delete​(java.lang.String url,
               boolean isRecursiveDelete)
        throws java.io.IOException
        Deletes the given file at the given url. To delete directories, specify isRecursiveDelete.
        Returns:
        whether after the deletion, there is no more file associated with the given url
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
